chapter.title: Managing the Rivendell Database with RDDbConfig

sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: RDDbConfig is a GUI module that allows basic administration (creation, upgrading, backup and restoration) of a Rivendell database.
When starting up RDDbConfig, you will be prompted to enter the 'root' password for the system.
After entering the correct 'root' password, the main RDDbConfig window will be displayed.

chapter.sect1:
Creating a New Database A 'new' database --i.e. one that contains only default objects -- can be generated by touching the Create button.
Generating a new database will COMPLETELY OVERWRITE whatever database is currently loaded!

sect1.title: Backing Up the Database
sect1.para: To make a backup copy of the database, touch the Backup button. You will be prompted with a dialog to allow you to choose a location to save the resulting backup.

sect1.title: Restoring the Database from a Backup
sect1.para: To restore a previous backup, touch the Restore button. You will be prompted with a dialog to allow you to choose a location whence to load the back file.
sect1.warning: Restoring a previous database will COMPLETELY OVERWRITE whatever database is currently loaded!
